def_cn: (与名词连用构成形容词)表示“像…大小的”，“与…一样大的”
def_en: You can use -size or -sized in combination with nouns to form adjectives which indicate that something is the same size as something else.

def_cn: (与形容词连用构成形容词)表示“…大小的”，“…规模的”
def_en: You can use -size or -sized in combination with adjectives to form adjectives which describe the size of something.

def_cn: (与名词连用构成形容词)表示“合适…的”，“合…规格的”
def_en: You can use -size or -sized in combination with nouns to form adjectives which indicate that something is big enough or small enough to be suitable for a particular job or purpose.
